channel.title: Angular on console.log('Hello World!');
channel.description: Recent content in Angular on console.log('Hello World!');

item.title: Developing an Angular project on Cloud9 IDE
item.description: Update NodeJS version All of the blank VMs on cloud9 have nvm pre installed. List all the available versions from the official site. nvm ls-remote Choose to install the latest version nvm install v10.6.0 Choose to use the latest version nvm use v10.6.0 Check the version in use node --version Angular Install latest Angular CLI package npm install -g @angular/cli Create a new project named my-project (you can use any name you need) ng new my-project cd my-project Change start script in package.
